inclusion.criterion: Pre- and post-pubertal patients who are diagnosed with conditions that necessitate chemo- or radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pre- and post-pubertal patients who are diagnosed with conditions that necessitate chemo- or radiotherapy and wish to preserve their ovarian function
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient wishes to preserve her ovarian function

exclusion.criterion: Patients with acute or chronic conditions that would preclude surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and wishes to preserve her ovarian function. She does not have any conditions that would preclude surgery.
